1 # Makefile for libxml2, specific for Windows, BCB6 and Borland make.
  2 #
  3 # Take a look at the beginning and modify the variables to suit your 
  4 # environment. Having done that, you can do a
  5 #
  6 # make [all]     to build the libxml and the accompanying utilities.
  7 # make clean     to remove all compiler output files and return to a
  8 #                 clean state.
  9 # make rebuild   to rebuild everything from scratch. This basically does
 10 #                 a 'nmake clean' and then a 'nmake all'.
 11 # make install   to install the library and its header files.
 12 #
 13 # August 2003, Eric Zurcher <Eric.Zurcher@csiro.au>
 14 # based on the MSVC version of
 15 # March 2002, Igor Zlatkovic <igor@zlatkovic.com>
 16 #
 17 
 18 # There should never be a need to modify anything below this line.
 19 # ----------------------------------------------------------------
 20 
 21 AUTOCONF = .\config.bcb
 22 !include $(AUTOCONF)
 23 
 24 !if !$d(BCB)
 25 BCB = $(MAKEDIR)\..
 26 !endif
 27 .autodepend
 28 
 29 # Names of various input and output components.
 30 XML_NAME = xml2
 31 XML_BASENAME = lib$(XML_NAME)
 32 XML_SO = $(XML_BASENAME).dll
 33 XML_IMP = $(XML_BASENAME).lib
 34 XML_DEF = $(XML_BASENAME).def
 35 XML_A = $(XML_BASENAME)_a.lib
 36 DUMMY = dir.exists
 37 
 38 # Place where we let the compiler put its intermediate trash.
 39 BINDIR = bin.bcb
 40 XML_INTDIR = int.bcb
 41 XML_INTDIR_A = int.a.bcb
 42 UTILS_INTDIR = int.utils.bcb
 43 
 44 # The preprocessor and its options.
 45 CPP = cpp32.exe -P- -DWIN32
 46 CPPFLAGS = -I"$(XML_SRCDIR)\include" -DNOLIBTOOL 
 47 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" != "no"
 48 CPPFLAGS = $(CPPFLAGS) -D_REENTRANT -D__MT__
 49 !endif
 50 
 51 # The compiler and its options.
 52 CC = bcc32.exe
 53 CFLAGS = -q -DWIN32 -D_NO_VCL -D_WINDOWS -D_MBCS -DEILSEQ=2 -DNOLIBTOOL -w-
 54 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -I"$(XML_SRCDIR)" -I"$(XML_SRCDIR)\include" -I"$(INCPREFIX)" -I"$(INCLUDE)"
 55 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" != "no"
 56 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -D_REENTRANT -tWM
 57 !endif
 58 !if "$(DYNRUNTIME)" == "1"
 59 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -tWR
 60 !endif
 61 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" == "yes" || "$(WITH_THREADS)" == "ctls"
 62 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -DHAVE_WIN32_THREADS -DHAVE_COMPILER_TLS
 63 !else if "$(WITH_THREADS)" == "native"
 64 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -DHAVE_WIN32_THREADS
 65 !else if "$(WITH_THREADS)" == "posix"
 66 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -DHAVE_PTHREAD_H
 67 !endif
 68 
 69 # The linker and its options.
 70 LD = ilink32.exe
 71 LDFLAGS = -q -U$(LIBXML_MAJOR_VERSION).$(LIBXML_MINOR_VERSION)
 72 LDFLAGS = $(LDFLAGS) -L"$(BINDIR);$(LIBPREFIX);$(LIB);$(BCB)\lib;$(BCB)\lib\PSdk"
 73 LIBS = import32.lib
 74 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" != "no" && "$(DYNRUNTIME)" == "1"
 75 LIBS = $(LIBS) cw32mti.lib
 76 !elif "$(WITH_THREADS)" != "no"
 77 LIBS = $(LIBS) cw32mt.lib
 78 !elif "$(DYNRUNTIME)" == "1"
 79 LIBS = $(LIBS) cw32i.lib
 80 !else
 81 LIBS = $(LIBS) cw32.lib
 82 !endif
 83 !if "$(WITH_FTP)" == "1" || "$(WITH_HTTP)" == "1"
 84 LIBS = $(LIBS) wsock32.lib ws2_32.lib
 85 !endif 
 86 !if "$(WITH_ICONV)" == "1"
 87 LIBS = $(LIBS) iconvomf.lib
 88 !endif 
 89 !if "$(WITH_ZLIB)" == "1"
 90 LIBS = $(LIBS) zlibomf.lib
 91 !endif
 92 !if "$(WITH_LZMA)" == "1"
 93 LIBS = $(LIBS) liblzma.lib
 94 !endif
 95 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" == "posix"
 96 LIBS = $(LIBS) pthreadVC.lib
 97 !endif
 98 !if "$(WITH_MODULES)" == "1"
 99 LIBS = $(LIBS) kernel32.lib
100 !endif
101 
102 # The archiver and its options.
103 AR = tlib.exe
104 ARFLAGS = /P64 /0
105 
106 # Optimisation and debug symbols.
107 !if "$(DEBUG)" == "1"
108 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -D_DEBUG -Od -v
109 LDFLAGS = $(LDFLAGS) -v
110 !else
111 CFLAGS = $(CFLAGS) -DNDEBUG -O2 
112 LDFLAGS = $(LDFLAGS)
113 !endif
114

162 XML_OBJS_A = $(XML_INTDIR_A)\buf.obj\
163 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\c14n.obj\
164 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\catalog.obj\
165 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\chvalid.obj\
166 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\debugXML.obj\
167 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\dict.obj\
168 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\DOCBparser.obj\
169 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\encoding.obj\
170 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\entities.obj\
171 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\error.obj\
172 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\globals.obj\
173 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\hash.obj\
174 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\HTMLparser.obj\
175 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\HTMLtree.obj\
176 	$(XML_INTDIR_A)\legacy.obj\

206 
207 # Xmllint and friends executables.
208 UTILS = $(BINDIR)\xmllint.exe\
209 	$(BINDIR)\xmlcatalog.exe\
210 	$(BINDIR)\testAutomata.exe\
211 	$(BINDIR)\testC14N.exe\
212 	$(BINDIR)\testDocbook.exe\
213 	$(BINDIR)\testHTML.exe\

221 	$(BINDIR)\testXPath.exe\

227 
228 !if "$(WITH_THREADS)" != "no"


229 UTILS = $(UTILS) $(BINDIR)\testThreads.exe
230 !endif
231 
232 
233 all : libxml libxmla utils
234 
235 libxml : $(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO) 
236 
237 libxmla : $(BINDIR)\$(XML_A)
238 
239 utils : $(UTILS)
240 
241 clean :
242 	if exist $(XML_INTDIR) rmdir /S /Q $(XML_INTDIR)
243 	if exist $(XML_INTDIR_A) rmdir /S /Q $(XML_INTDIR_A)
244 	if exist $(UTILS_INTDIR) rmdir /S /Q $(UTILS_INTDIR)
245 	if exist $(BINDIR) rmdir /S /Q $(BINDIR)
246 
247 distclean : clean
248 	if exist config.* del config.*
249 	if exist Makefile del Makefile
250 
251 rebuild : clean all
252 
253 install-libs : all
254 	if not exist "$(INCPREFIX)\libxml2" mkdir "$(INCPREFIX)\libxml2"
255 	if not exist "$(INCPREFIX)\libxml2\libxml" mkdir "$(INCPREFIX)\libxml2\libxml"
256 	if not exist "$(BINPREFIX)" mkdir "$(BINPREFIX)"
257 	if not exist "$(LIBPREFIX)" mkdir "$(LIBPREFIX)"
258 	copy $(XML_SRCDIR)\include\libxml\*.h "$(INCPREFIX)\libxml2\libxml"
259 	copy $(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO) "$(SOPREFIX)"
260 	copy $(BINDIR)\$(XML_A) "$(LIBPREFIX)"
261 	copy $(BINDIR)\$(XML_IMP) "$(LIBPREFIX)"
262 	copy $(BINDIR)\*.exe "$(BINPREFIX)"
263 
264 install : install-libs
265 	copy $(BINDIR)\*.exe "$(BINPREFIX)"
266 
267 install-dist : install-libs
268 	copy $(BINDIR)\xml*.exe "$(BINPREFIX)"
269 
270 # This is a target for me, to make a binary distribution. Not for the public use,
271 # keep your hands off :-)
272 BDVERSION = $(LIBXML_MAJOR_VERSION).$(LIBXML_MINOR_VERSION).$(LIBXML_MICRO_VERSION)
273 BDPREFIX = $(XML_BASENAME)-$(BDVERSION).win32
274 bindist : all
275 	$(MAKE) /nologo PREFIX=$(BDPREFIX) SOPREFIX=$(BDPREFIX)\bin install-dist
276 	cscript //NoLogo configure.js genreadme $(XML_BASENAME) $(BDVERSION) $(BDPREFIX)\readme.txt
277 
278 
279 # Makes the output directory.
280 $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY) :
281 	if not exist $(BINDIR) mkdir $(BINDIR)
282 	touch $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY)
283 
284 # Makes the libxml intermediate directory.
285 $(XML_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY) :
286 	if not exist $(XML_INTDIR) mkdir $(XML_INTDIR)
287 	touch $(XML_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY)
288 
289 # Makes the static libxml intermediate directory.
290 $(XML_INTDIR_A)\$(DUMMY) :
291 	if not exist $(XML_INTDIR_A) mkdir $(XML_INTDIR_A)
292 	touch $(XML_INTDIR_A)\$(DUMMY)
293 
294 # An implicit rule for libxml compilation.
295 {$(XML_SRCDIR)}.c{$(XML_INTDIR)}.obj:
296 	$(CC) $(CFLAGS) -n$(XML_INTDIR) -c $<
297 
298 # An implicit rule for static libxml compilation.
299 {$(XML_SRCDIR)}.c{$(XML_INTDIR_A)}.obj:
300 	$(CC) $(CFLAGS) -DLIBXML_STATIC -n$(XML_INTDIR_A)\ -c $<
301 
302 # Compiles libxml source. Uses the implicit rule for commands.
303 $(XML_OBJS) : $(XML_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY)
304 
305 # Compiles static libxml source. Uses the implicit rule for commands.
306 $(XML_OBJS_A) : $(XML_INTDIR_A)\$(DUMMY) 
307 
308 #def4bcb.exe : def4bcb.c
309 
310 # Creates the export definition file (DEF) for libxml.
311 #$(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF) : $(XML_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(XML_DEF).src def4bcb.exe
312 #	$(CPP) $(CPPFLAGS) -o $(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF).tmp $(XML_DEF).src
313 #	def4bcb -msnames < $(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF).tmp > $(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF)
314 
315 # Creates the libxml shared object.
316 $(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO) : $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(XML_OBJS)
317 	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) -Tpd -Gi c0d32.obj $(XML_OBJS),$(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO),,$(LIBS)
318 
319 #$(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO) : $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(XML_OBJS) $(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF)
320 #	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) -Tpd -Gi c0d32.obj $(XML_OBJS),$(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO),,$(LIBS),$(XML_INTDIR)\$(XML_DEF)
321 
322 # Creates the libxml archive.
323 $(BINDIR)\$(XML_A) : $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(XML_OBJS_A)
324 	$(AR) $(BINDIR)\$(XML_A) $(ARFLAGS) /u $(XML_OBJS_A)
325 
326 # Makes the utils intermediate directory.
327 $(UTILS_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY) :
328 	if not exist $(UTILS_INTDIR) mkdir $(UTILS_INTDIR)
329 	touch $(UTILS_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY)
330 
331 # An implicit rule for xmllint and friends.
332 !if "$(STATIC)" == "1"
333 {$(UTILS_SRCDIR)}.c{$(BINDIR)}.exe:
334 	$(CC) -DLIBXML_STATIC -w -tWC $(CFLAGS) -o$(UTILS_INTDIR)\$&.obj -c $< 
335 	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) c0x32.obj $(UTILS_INTDIR)\$&.obj,$@,,$(LIBS) $(XML_A)
336 !else
337 {$(UTILS_SRCDIR)}.c{$(BINDIR)}.exe:
338 	$(CC) $(CFLAGS) -tWC -o$(UTILS_INTDIR)\$&.obj -c $< 
339 	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) c0x32.obj $(UTILS_INTDIR)\$&.obj $(XML_IMP),$@,,$(LIBS) 
340 !endif
341 
342 # Builds xmllint and friends. Uses the implicit rule for commands.
343 $(UTILS) : $(UTILS_INTDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(BINDIR)\$(DUMMY) $(BINDIR)\$(XML_SO) $(BINDIR)\$(XML_A)
344

346 # do it? I have no clue.
